name: Role Of Dice (Hesamdev)
description:
This is Alpha version of a game that i was working on for some time. Roll Of Dice a game which you will roll a dice to get powers . powers to use for solving puzzles of that level. each power will come with a stratgy for you to finish that level . (This is demo 0.1 so beware there will be bugs ) 

Note : there is only 1 demo level you can play
